html:
6.6.19  3:01 am   why haven't you put i'm crazy/it's raining on spotify or amazon music?

     i'm not sure

      are you planning to?

     yes

      it's one of my favs

6.6.19  2:20 am   Your videos are awesome! My question is... How do I speed up time so that your videos come faster?

     how do i slow down time so i can make more of them

6.6.19  1:16 am   Did you really Quit?

     not even close

      please say no.

6.6.19  12:16 am   whats your favorite alphabet

     qwertyuiop

6.5.19  11:01 pm   talk shows / interviews have this kind of intimate feeling with the audience don't they...

     it's possible, depending on how the studio is set up

6.5.19  10:08 pm   The "stay strong" at the end of And The Day Goes On is arguably my favorite part of the song, and I've taken that message to heart. It's helped me through some shit, multiple shits in fact, so personally I see  a deeper meaning in it. When you wrote the line, was it just what worked the best in that moment for the song, or did it have a deeper meaning for you?

     'stay strong' is already a very meaningful phrase. it is a very meaningful thing to do. combined with expressing it in the most meaningful way possible with the arrangement, placing the tempo slowdown in a precise way, and the vocal delivery, hopefully all added even more to support the meaningfulness

6.5.19  10:07 pm   Did "we could just get high" get a new album cover on Spotify?

     no

6.5.19  9:24 pm   was stonehedge built by aliens?

     no

6.5.19  8:16 pm   can u explain to me the heisenberg uncertainty principle 

     it's impossible to know the top and bottom text of a meme simultaneously

6.5.19  7:57 pm   Are you a criminal?

     i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

6.5.19  7:25 pm   will you release the next video on a tuesday?

     possibly

6.5.19  6:10 pm   whats your next playthrough of existence going to be like?

     don't know until i know the rest of this one

6.5.19  5:06 pm   Do you ever play out of Aebersold books?

     made my own

      If so, which one is your favorite?

     the real book

6.5.19  4:20 pm   When you see the questions category, it just says questions, but when you click it, it says ueqstions. Why?

     this site uses colorful letter arrangements for the titles of most pages

6.5.19  3:44 pm   how do you feel about lava

     too hot. prefer iced lava

6.5.19  2:52 pm   Where is the ideal place to hide a giant stash of peas in my house?

     at an undisclosed location (don't say the location, that's why i am not saying and neither should you)

6.5.19  1:47 pm   how do I start a woodworking business

     you're gonna wanna go ahead and start working some wood

6.5.19  12:36 pm   wfaoie episode 2 or riot

     fair enough

6.5.19  11:27 am   Do you think there is sense in making sense?

     that's like the whole point

6.5.19  10:44 am   how do i get better at improvisational jazz piano

     should happen automatically if you really love spending time with the instrument

6.5.19  10:30 am   is humanity going through adolescence?

     yes, extremely

6.5.19  10:08 am   do you pre-plan the solos in your songs

     no

6.5.19  9:00 am   it has become clear that I need to get better at planning. any good planning tips?

     start by figuring out what you want

6.5.19  8:41 am   i spent a long time to make something. i made it. then i become sad. are you happy now?

     not because of that

6.5.19  8:21 am   who would you say is your biggest musical inspiration

     what is most inspiring is for me to be the inspiration

6.5.19  7:55 am   What inspired you to write the song Slow Down,

     the 2 week song schedule

      and how did you get the bit about the hourglass twisting a little bit sideways?

     just made it up

      I also noticed that at the end of La De Da De Da De Da De Day Oh you lost your home, then later in Slow Down the whole neighborhood disappeared. What's with that? 

     i thought those were about you

6.5.19  7:02 am   go on tour!!!!!! PLEASE

     ok

6.5.19  6:29 am   were you angrier when you were younger

     no

6.5.19  5:46 am   have you ever tried memorizing long blocks of text word by word as a challenge

     sure

6.5.19  5:25 am   what should i write for my essay on oppression

     write about how oppression is bad and how it's totally not being done on you

6.5.19  4:45 am   Would you rule out ever making an album or musical, or something "commercial"?

     seems like i've done all of that already

6.5.19  3:36 am   should i do the thing?

     no but don't let that stop you

6.5.19  2:22 am   i just proved to myself that i don't have to finish writing a song in one sitting and now i feel dangerous.

     #relatable

6.5.19  1:34 am   When do I quit?

     at the end

6.5.19  12:56 am   What are the invisible e's and p's in the reality section

     date edited, date posted

6.4.19  11:37 pm   i have good memory and that makes me resent my loved ones for the bad times or specific situations. And when im angry at them its easy to get angrier by just remembering all the bad (since those memories come back sort of as a way to justify my feeling i feel.) and resenting them on the spot. you got any tips to truly forgive people? 

     it might be good to spend some time away from those people

6.4.19  11:24 pm   Your songs are insanely catchy. There have been several times I wake up in the morning and "might quit" or "just did a bad thing" is running through my head over and over again. What do I do in these situations??

     if you don't like this, then you can listen to another song for a while, that should get rid of them

6.4.19  10:48 pm   Do you like ants

     too fuckin small

6.4.19  10:10 pm   how do i stop regretting things i didn't do

     try to start regretting things you did do

6.4.19  10:00 pm   how do i make decisions if i don't know which decisions are the right ones until i've made the decisions and then it's too late because time has passed and i can't go back and then i'm sad

     don't make decisions. break decisions

6.4.19  9:36 pm   Hey what happens to the ducks in Central Park when the ponds freeze over?

     i think they probably went to a different park

6.4.19  9:23 pm   How am I supposed to live life?

     boringly

6.4.19  9:15 pm   Progress report 

     no end in sight

6.4.19  9:12 pm   Do you have any recommendations regarding how to sweat less

     ultimately you are going to need to find some lower room temperatures

6.4.19  8:31 pm   help me the fact that you park in a driveway and drive in a parkway is giving me a headache what should i do

     have you considered going into a deep deep slumber

6.4.19  7:12 pm   Do you hide hints of upcoming videos/songs/events in your anagrams?

     not usually

6.4.19  7:01 pm   who's your favorite beatle

     what the hell is a beatle

6.4.19  7:01 pm   Hello, I asked you if Mark Zuckerberg was a human, but do aliens exist??

     everyone is an alien in relation to someone from a different world

6.4.19  6:20 pm   6.2.19  10:36 pm So what do you do when two or more questions were asked during the same minute? 

     there are 4 options for me in that situation: answer 1, answer the other, answer neither, or answer both

6.4.19  6:16 pm   Can you believe it's already June?

     let me see
